ik-SkuHSIp3w7im1UKusPw.text: I stumbled across this gem while exploring central Edinburgh. The food is absolutely amazing. Truly authentic Greek dishes with plenty of menu options, along with daily specials.  The place is spotless, the pricing is quite good and the employees very friendly.   I've been eating here everyday since discovering it and plan to keep doing so until I head back home in a couple of weeks.

5MKulH60H7a-ICWVk4J7BQ.text: Tried their sweet custard cream which was great as always!!! I will update my review once I have tried their food and coffee, looking forward to it as the manager and owner really loves his job and customers and goes the extra mile for amazing service! Keep it up sir!! Big fun!

5BvrLHQnYa0fF5Ynm7jv2g.text: This place is awesome.  Authentic food.  We ate here twice during our time in Edinburgh. Both times both the food and the service were great.  I recommend saving room for a special desert. I wish there was something similar where I live.
